label: 鎮西奉行
本: The Cambridge History of Japan, Volume 3:  Medieval Japan . Cambridge University Press . 1990
説明文: A post held in Kyushu by two commissioners appointed by the Kamakura bakufu to oversee local affairs and maintain peace among the Minamoto vassals. Superseded by the Chinzei tandai in the late thirteenth century.　[鎮西探題]
